name: Soaphie Bubbles
description:
This is my attempt at making a game for Mini Jam 84 where the theme is Bubbles and the limitation is You are your own ammo.

CONTROLS

  • Space or W: Jump
  • A: Move left
  • D: Move right
  • Mouse (Point): Aim
  • Left Click (Hold then release): Charge then fire bubble
  • Right Click (While charging): Cancel charge

CREDITS

MUSIC:

Android Sock Hop by Kevin MacLeod

Link: https://incompetech.filmmusic.io/song/3366-android-sock-hop
